component.name: Sourcetrail
component.summary: Multi Language Source Explorer and Indexer

description.p: Sourcetrail is an application that helps you navigate and understanding large codebases.
It supports C, C++, Java, and Python out of the box.

Sourcetrails intuitive visualization helps you to understand even large unfamiliar codebases quickly, but also helps you to understand the relation between different pieces of code in projects you are already familiar with.
Sourcetrail handles even the largest codebases with multiple millions of lines of code.

There are many connectors, to integrate Sourcetrail in to the code editor of your choice:
Atom
Clion
Eclipse
Emacs
IntelliJ IDEA
Neovim
PyCharm
QtCreator
Sublime Text
Vim
Visual Studio Code
